name: Islamic: Girl Puzzle
description:
Islamic : Girl Puzzle works almost like real jigsaw puzzles for kids. Once you pick a piece it stays on the board even if you place it incorrectly, and you can nudge pieces around until it snaps to the right slot. 

Each relaxing puzzle features a different beautiful scene drawn by a professional cartoon artist, and a unique reward when the jigsaw puzzle is completed. Scenes include things like cute animals, dragons, or dinosaurs, and the rewards can be to pop balloons, fruits, snowflakes or many more!

Islamic : Girl Puzzle Features :

- 8 different kids jigsaw puzzles with gorgeous HD graphics
- Tons of unique and perplexing Girl puzzles to play with. Stay tuned for upcoming new ones!
- Receive bonus reward by completing achievement targets
- Play with your own pace: Make the jigsaw as simple/hard as you want
- Beautiful HD picture jigsaws in various themes: Animal, Scenery, Plant and City
- Completely FREE Girl photo puzzle game
- Easy and relaxing to play, hard to fully master
- Enjoyable game for EVERYONE: Kid, Adult, Commuter, Girl, Boy, Housewives, Elderly etc.
- Play whenever and wherever you want: WIFI is not a must for Game
- Cool Sound
- Great Graphics

5 puzzles are available for free , Remaining 3 Come as soon as..!

For more fun check out our other cool, fun and educational kids games for babies, toddlers, boys and girls!

Download and join Islamic : Girl Puzzle photo game NOW!
